tasks.label: Backup (local + Nextcloud, keep last 5)
tasks.command: mkdir -p backups && ZIP="backups/portfolio-$(date +%F_%H%M)-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD).zip" && git archive --format=zip -o "$ZIP" HEAD && count=$(ls -1 backups/*.zip 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "${count:-0}" -gt 5 ]; then ls -1t backups/*.zip | tail -n +6 | xargs -r rm -f; fi && cp "$ZIP" "/Users/pharnsgenece/Nextcloud/04 - ARCHIVES [Nextcloud]/Portfolio Backups/" && echo 'âœ… Backup complete. Current local backups:' && ls -1t backups/*.zip 2>/dev/null | nl
